pages.title: White Out
pages.text: With your $(item)Respirator$() equipped, it should be safe enough to enter the $(thing)Mist$(). Be wary of the durability of your $(item)Filter Coal$() though, lest it run out leaving you stranded. It may be wise to carry a $(item)Block Of Filter Coal$() as it will filter a small localised area when placed, giving you a window in which to swap out the filter in the $(item)Respirator$().
